initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/testformoney');
escapeAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Welcome to the Secret Base Guild, we sell basics to get any base started!

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which items would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which items would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which items would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: A great tool to have in your base! Would you like a Netherite Pickaxe for $1600?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1600..}] run give @s minecraft:netherite_pickaxe 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1600..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1600..}] run scoreboard players remove @s Money 1600');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');
